projects.title: Team5 Restaurant
projects.bodyText:
- Built a web application that enables restaurant customers to book a table
 -  Order their favorite meals
 - Receive confirmation of their reservation and their order via email with the option of modifying or canceling

projects.title: Watch Gallery
projects.bodyText:
- Allows users to have CRUD ability to view, add, edit and delete products
 - Users have to create an account and sign in to access all the features of the website 
 - Developed from inception and wire-framing to deployment with Heroku.

projects.title: Flash Card
projects.bodyText:
- Player has to match 6 pairs of cards to win the game. Based around programming language logos.
 - Developed plan and wireframe to complete the project on a tight deadline.
 - A flash card game solidifying usage of JavaScript, CSS, HTML.
 - Deployed on heroku
